title: Should I make a zed montage?
body: I know i'm pretty low elo and really don't deserve making a montage but when I play zed I make some really good plays. There are many high elo players who said my zed was good ^^ but however i'm pretty sure that if I make a zed montage everyone be like "Omggg he's low elo, stupid enemys don't know how to play against zed" and so on. I was just wondering if you guys would support me on making my very first zed montage.

replies.body: No. There is no way you could compare such a montage to our lord and saviour vNutz.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=5LtlOBo6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-30T00:16:58.760+0000)
>
> No. There is no way you could compare such a montage to our lord and saviour vNutz.

No one beats VermilionGod
